levels.description: ASPD <@ba.vup>+{attack_speed}</>, attack <@ba.vup>1</> additional target; if target is under the burst effect of <$ba.dt.apoptosis2>Necrosis damage</>, deal an additional <@ba.vup>{attack@extra_ep_damage_scale:0%}</> ATK as Elemental Damage
